column1: On [[30 October]] [[1965]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"
column2: a letter]] to J.L.N. O'Loughlin'''.<ref name=CG>{{CG
column6: articlename=J.R.R. Tolkien Collection: Other Tolkien Writings, 1911-1976

column1: *'''Subject:''' Tolkien replies that he has read O'Loughlin's article (possibly included in ''Odham's Dictionary of the English Language'', 1965). He does not have time to provide commentary, besides finding the article plausible.<ref name=CG/>
*'''Publication:''' A description of the letter appeared in ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide
column2: The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide: Chronology]]''.
